We are currently in the process of developing a range of courses for you to enjoy. 

The first one we are working on is: 

Guided Meditation Mastery: A Comprehensive Guide to Teaching and Leading 
Guided Meditations (Certification) 

Please head to the website www.in2bliss.com/courses for more information and to register your interest.
Journal is added at selected date please select different date
Password validation with Uppercase, Lowercase, special character,number and limit 8 must be required.
Benefits of seeing positive written affirmations every day:

1. Improved mindset: shifting the negative or self-limiting thoughts to positive empowering thoughts rewires your brain. 

2. Increased self-confidence and self-image by internalizing positive statements about yourself. 

3. Reduce stress and anxiety, promoting an optimistic, positive outlook. 

4. Enhanced motivation and goal achievement, helping you stay focused and reminding yourself of your potential and capabilities, helping you to persevere through challenges.

According to the Law of Attraction and the Law of Assumption, affirmations play a crucial role in manifesting desires and shaping one's reality. 

They help to align your thoughts and beliefs with desired outcomes, influencing your attitudes and behaviors by reprogramming your subconscious mind, increasing your vibrational alignment, and raising your frequency so that you attract new things in alignment with your energy.

Take a deep breath, and enjoy the journey In2Bliss.

1. Stress reduction, lower cortisol, decreased anxiety, and depression. 

2. Improve focus, attention, and cognitive performance. 

3. Improved emotional well-being and regulation: increased happiness and contentment. 

4. Enhanced self-awareness, understanding, self-acceptance, and skillful responding. 

5. Improved cognitive abilities, memory, creativity, problem-solving, and mental flexibility. 

6. Overall general well-being: calm, peace, and life satisfaction. 

7. Physical health: Lower blood pressure, boost the immune system, improve sleep, decrease heart disease and inflammation.

Spiritually, meditation can lead to an increased understanding of the inner self, more connection to the present moment, and an expanded consciousness with an increased opportunity for altered states of awareness.

Regular meditation can also lead to a deepened sense of purpose and meaning, enriched compassion and kindness, and transcendence of aspects of the ego.

Results will vary from person to person and may depend on consistency and time spent in your meditation practice.

Having a regular place and time to meditate will help you to drop in quicker.

Consistency is key to reaping the benefits of meditation.


For more information, best practices and helpful hints, please visit www.in2bliss.com/guided-meditations 

Take a deep breath, and enjoy the journey In2Bliss.
Benefits of listening to guided affirmations:

1. Improved mindset, self-confidence, and self-belief. 

2. Help you to overcome self-limiting beliefs. 

3. Reduce stress and anxiety and promote emotional well-being. 

4. Enhanced motivation, focus, and goal achievement. 

5. Encourages self-awareness and self-reflection. 

6. Improved resilience and positive outlook. 

7. Consciously create your life by aligning your thoughts and intentions with the reality you desire to manifest. 

8. Shifting beliefs, conditioning, and old energy and rewiring your mind and energy field with new positive life-affirming frequencies. 

9. Directing your manifestation and attraction 

10. Amplifying self-love and self-acceptance.

Metaphysically positive affirmations play a crucial role in manifesting desires and shaping one’s reality.

They can align your thoughts and beliefs, activate your subconscious mind to influence your beliefs, attitudes, and behavior, increase your vibrational alignment, raise your frequency, and affect what is attracted to you.

All guided affirmations can be personalized: You can adjust the length of affirmations, the music, and the voice-to-music balance to enhance your experience.

Do your best to FEEL the affirmations: When you feel you make it real. As you listen to the guided affirmations, engage your imagination and visualize yourself embodying the qualities or experiences mentioned. Try to evoke the emotions and sensations associated with those affirmations. This connection between the mind and heart can enhance the impact of the affirmations. 
 
For more information, best practices, and helpful hints please visit in2bliss.com/affirmations. 
Take a deep breath, and enjoy the journey In2Bliss.
All guided affirmations can be personalized for your individual needs:

~ Adjust the voice-to-music balance 

~ Adjust the length of time the affirmations will play and how long the music will play 

~ Change the recommended music to your favorite music track if you wish 

~ Choose black screen or not 

~ Choose your sleep time

Prepare your sleep sanctuary for ultimate relaxation at the same time every night. Eliminate distractions and create a peaceful atmosphere that promotes tranquility. 

For more information, best practices, and helpful hints, please visit www.in2bliss.com/sleep 

Take a deep breath, and enjoy the journey In2Bliss.
Benefits of keeping a regular gratitude journal include:

The benefits of cultivating a consistent gratitude journal and recording your blessings are truly remarkable.

By consciously focusing on the positive aspects of your life, you shift your perspective and become more aware of the blessings that surround you.

This practice helps you appreciate the present moment, find joy in the little things, and foster a sense of contentment and fulfillment.

1. Increasing feelings of happiness and well-being 

2. Training your brain to focus on the positive, rewiring your thoughts. 

3. A more optimistic outlook and improved mood. 

4. Reduce stress and build resilience. 

5. Promotes a sense of calm and a broader perspective. 

6. Allows you to navigate difficult situations with greater resilience and a positive mindset.

1. Set reminders in In2Bliss to encourage your healthy habit of gratitude. 

2. Be specific and give detailed descriptions instead of simply listing things. 

3. Include small moments, and embrace the beauty in the everyday. 

4. Reflect on the positives in challenges and lessons learned to help shift your perspective and foster personal growth. 


For more information, best practices, and helpful hints, please visit: www.in2bliss.com/gratitude-journal
Benefits of creating your own affirmations:
Create your own affirmations and personalize them:

1. Personalization 

2. Hearing your own voice enhances effectiveness, creating a stronger connection and resonance with your subconscious mind. 

3. Increased self-awareness and self-understanding 

4. Empowerment and agency over your own mindset and beliefs. Affirmations serve as a tool to align your mindset and energy with your desired outcomes, helping you manifest and attract what you desire into your life. They also serve to reprogram your mind into the belief pattern that you choose to have.

~ Write your own script 

~ Record and edit within the app 

~ Add your favorite music from our extensive library 

~ Adjust your voice-to-music balance 

~ Adjust the length of time your affirmations and music play 

~ Choose a black screen or image 

~ Add it to your favorite mix or subcategory.

Use positive, present, or past tense, emotional, descriptive, and sensory language. Add feeling and energy to your affirmations and repeat them regularly to reinforce the new positive beliefs in your subconscious mind. 

For more information, best practices, and helpful hints on how to create your own affirmations, please visit www.in2bliss.com/create-your-affirmations 

Take a deep breath, and enjoy the journey In2Bliss. 

IMPORTANT: All music is for personal use only, is the property of the copyright holder, and is strictly prohibited from being shared publicly, sold, or for any commercial use. Please see our terms and conditions for more information.
